title: Building community care networks across generations
description: Building community care networks across generations
content:
Scenario: Building community care networks across generations
    Given Margaret connects with community members of all ages
    And she participates in various community activities
    When the community_elohim tracks social capital building
    Then it should recognize Margaret's role in community connection
    And it should value relationship-building as care work
    And it should show how her connections strengthen community resilience
    And intergenerational community building should be recognized
    And Margaret should help create inclusive, connected community
    And social capital creation should accumulate care tokens
